ThingDef.label: ceramite bulbs
ThingDef.description: Harvesting the bulbs of the ceramite flower, Once separated from the chaff, the bulbs may be smelted at an Electric Smelter into usable ceramite.

ThingDef.label: adamantium bulbs plant bulbs
ThingDef.description: Bulbs taken from a adamantium plant. May be smelted into usable uranium at an Electric Smelter.

ThingDef.label: amethyst crystal
ThingDef.description: Crystalline crystals of a amethyst Crystal. Suspended within photosynthetic fluid are particles of amethyst that may be extracted at an Electric Smelter.
